trans-unit.source: Represents the wst:Renewing element in a WS-Trust renew request.
trans-unit.target: Representerer wst: fornye elementet i WS-Trust fornye forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: This optional element indicates to the token issuer that the requested token can be renewed if the Allow attribute is true and that the token can be renewed after it expires if the OK attribute is true.
trans-unit.target: Dette valgfrie elementet angir token utstederen forespurte tokenet kan fornyes hvis attributtet Tillat er true og tokenet kan fornyes når det utløper hvis attributtet OK er true.

trans-unit.source: These attributes are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.AllowRenewal%2A> and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.OkForRenewalAfterExpiration%2A> properties respectively.
trans-unit.target: Disse attributtene representeres av den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.AllowRenewal%2A>og <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.OkForRenewalAfterExpiration%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.OkForRenewalAfterExpiration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.AllowRenewal%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the element that this class represents, see the version of the WS-Trust specification that applies to your scenario.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om elementet som denne klassen representerer, kan du se versjonen av WS-Trust spesifikasjonen som gjelder for scenariet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing"></xref><xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing"></xref> class with default property values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing"> </xref> <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing"> </xref> klasse standard egenskapsverdier.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing> instance.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for den nye <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing>forekomsten.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.AllowRenewal%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.OkForRenewalAfterExpiration%2A>|`false`|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.AllowRenewal%2A>| `true`| | <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.OkForRenewalAfterExpiration%2A>| `false`|</xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.OkForRenewalAfterExpiration%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.AllowRenewal%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing"></xref><xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing"></xref> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing"> </xref> <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing"> </xref> klassen med de angitte verdiene.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing> instance are set according to the value of the parameters.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper for den nye <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing>forekomsten er angitt i henhold til verdien av parameterne.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if renewal is permitted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis fornyelse tillates; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the requested token can be renewed after it has expired; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det forespurte tokenet kan fornyes når den er utløpt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the token can be renewed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om tokenet kan fornyes.

trans-unit.source: Represents the contents of the Allow attribute.
trans-unit.target: Representerer innholdet i Tillat-attributtet.

trans-unit.source: This optional attribute is used to request a renewable token.
trans-unit.target: Valgfrie attributtet brukes til å få en fornybart kode.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if renewal is permitted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis fornyelse tillates; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the token can be renewed after it has expired.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om tokenet kan fornyes etter at den har utløpt.

trans-unit.source: Represents the contents of the OK attribute.
trans-unit.target: Representerer innholdet for attributtet OK.

trans-unit.source: This optional attribute is used to indicate that a renewable token is acceptable if the requested duration exceeds the limit of the issuance service.
trans-unit.target: Valgfrie attributtet brukes til å angi at et fornybart token er godkjent hvis den forespurte varigheten overskrider grensen for endring av tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: That is, if `true`, then the token can be renewed after its expiration.
trans-unit.target: Det vil si hvis `true`, og deretter tokenet kan fornyes etter utløper.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false` for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `false` av sikkerhetsgrunner.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the requested token can be renewed after it has expired; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det forespurte tokenet kan fornyes når den er utløpt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
